description:
It appears like DBAPI is sending in some invalid types to postgresql.

http://logs.openstack.org/87/122887/14/check/check-tempest-dsvm-postgres-full/782c972/logs/screen-n-api.txt.gz?level=ERROR#_2014-09-22_19_30_51_970

ERROR oslo.db.sqlalchemy.exc_filters [req-00477f7e-725e-42ed-9a59-b0faeb484df8 ServersNegativeTestXML-814615051 ServersNegativeTestXML-182582183] DBAPIError exception wrapped from (DataError) value "9223372036854775808" is out of range for type integer
LINE 4: ...d5f14f2db4d4d819962511d1f0857' AND instances.id = '922337203...

Possibly to big of a type of an integer field....
title: DBAPIError exception wrapped from (DataError) value XYZ is out of range for type integer

comments.content:
It appears like DBAPI is sending in some invalid types to postgresql.

http://logs.openstack.org/87/122887/14/check/check-tempest-dsvm-postgres-full/782c972/logs/screen-n-api.txt.gz?level=ERROR#_2014-09-22_19_30_51_970

ERROR oslo.db.sqlalchemy.exc_filters [req-00477f7e-725e-42ed-9a59-b0faeb484df8 ServersNegativeTestXML-814615051 ServersNegativeTestXML-182582183] DBAPIError exception wrapped from (DataError) value "9223372036854775808" is out of range for type integer
LINE 4: ...d5f14f2db4d4d819962511d1f0857' AND instances.id = '922337203...

Possibly to big of a type of an integer field....
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~harlowja

comments.content: This is the reason for bringing in surface validation in the API, we've specifically decided not to do validation in python on the db layer.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
